snippet: Lieut. Gov. Gray Davis has maintained his lead among Democrats in the common primary for California governor next month, according to a poll by The Los Angeles Times.    Mr. Davis has the support of 28 percent of those likely to vote, the poll sai...
lead_paragraph: Lieut. Gov. Gray Davis has maintained his lead among Democrats in the common primary for California governor next month, according to a poll by The Los Angeles Times. Mr. Davis has the support of 28 percent of those likely to vote, the poll said. He polled only 13 percent last month.
abstract: Lt Gov Gray Davis maintains lead among Democrats in common primary for California governor (S)

headline.main: Lieutenant Governor Keeps Lead in Race
